mean_cn: adj. （表达意见或感情等）大声的，有力的
mean_en: expressing feelings or opinions in a very loud or forceful way
word_etyma: voci=voc呼喊，声，召集+fer带来+ous...的→带来声音的→喧闹的
short_phrase: her vociferous screaming at the man
sentence: When my boss really wants to make a point, she can be pretty vociferous.
sentence_trans: 当老板真的想强调某个点时，她能变得非常大声。
